rel_desc: The metaphorical road to progress implies movement toward a better world.
resolution_context: The text links progress with overcoming oppression and creating a better world; direction inferred, not explicit.
justification: Although not stated directly, "road to progress" in the same sentence as "create a better world" implies progress culminates in a better world.
remark: Relation inferred to preserve implied teleology; semantics somewhat interpretive.
